title: 当漫山遍野的TNT爆炸.....
txt_content:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjM1NzkxNzU2/v.swf
命令方块做的刷tnt的矿车

replies.author: 德玛西亚小蜗牛
replies.txt_content: 丧心病狂的指令啊啊啊啊

德玛西亚小蜗牛 发表于 2013-11-17 10:01 
丧心病狂的指令啊啊啊啊
命令方块输
/summon MinecartSpawner ~ ~20 ~ {Riding:{id:"Bat"},SpawnRange:0,MinSpawnDelay:1,SpawnData:{TileID:46,Time:1,DropItem:0},EntityId:"FallingSand",SpawnCount:1}
连上高频红石
之后就刷了

replies.author: allan0327
replies.txt_content: {:10_495:}丧心病狂的楼主 显卡菌你是否还活着

replies.author: dasd23
replies.txt_content: 有了这个，麻麻再也不担心我们不能把土豪（熊孩子）的家给炸坏了！
